41 // Constructor/Destructor
42 
43 ServiceServer::ServiceServer(ros::NodeHandle* nh, string nodename)
44  : TapiClient(nh, nodename, SERVICE_SERVER), nh(nh), nodename(nodename)
45 {
46 }
47 
48 ServiceServer::~ServiceServer()
49 {
50  for (int i = 0; i < services.size(); i++)
51  {
52  services[i].second->shutdown();
53  delete services[i].second;
54  services[i].second = 0;
55  }
56 }
57 
58 // Public member functions
59 
60 ros::ServiceServer* ServiceServer::AddFeature(ros::AdvertiseServiceOptions opt, string featurename)
61 {
62  std::string featureUUID = getNextFeatureUUID();
63  ros::ServiceServer* service = 0;
64  std::string serviceName = "/Tapi/" + uuid + "/" + featureUUID;
65  opt.service = serviceName;
66 
67  service = new ros::ServiceServer(nh->advertiseService(opt));
68 
69  if (service)
70  {
71  pair<ros::AdvertiseServiceOptions, ros::ServiceServer*> newEntry;
72  newEntry = make_pair(opt, service);
73  services.push_back(newEntry);
74  tapi_lib::Feature feature;
75  string temp = opt.datatype;
76  feature.FeatureType = temp;
77  feature.Name = featurename;
78  feature.UUID = featureUUID;
79  featureMsgs.push_back(feature);
80  }
81  connect();
82  return service;
83 }
84 }
